import React from 'react'; import './Aboutus.css'; import { Navbar, Container, Nav, NavDropdown, Form, FormControl, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Bike from '../../Assets/images/about/bike.png'; import Bike2 from '../../Assets/images/about/bike2.png'; const Aboutus = props => { return ( <>
Legacy

THE RUMBLE IS BACK 😎

The first Cotton motorcycle appeared in 1920. Cotton motorbikes became legendary thanks to the sporting models and their victories in the Isle of Man 'Tourist Trophy' (T.T.) and in the most audacious races of the "British Sixties". Some of the most iconic winners made Cotton an iconic brand, often setting new standards.

We are bringing back the rumble of Cotton The Motorcycle Masterpiece ® going all the way from an extraordinary garage in Stockwell (UK) to the world stage. Just like an indie Rock band would do, we are starting from the fine-tuning process of state-of- the-art manufacturing and working upwards to determine an uncompromising look that tells a story worth being told. Our vision is beyond the act of selling a product.

We envision the creation of community, a vast group of individuals who recognise the core values of an organic motorcycle brand and come together to ride down their unique paths on the basis of shared beliefs and the empowerment that comes from living life on their terms.

Rock and Roll isn't for everyone, but those who get it never let go. The same goes for a Cotton motorcycle.

Values 😍

Cotton is the true reunion between Motorcycles and Rockers. Our Values are represented by the British heritage of sporting motorbikes and the urban Rocker culture centred on motorcycles and rock 'n' roll deepest values. We intend to bring back the true rockers' look, style, emotions, and attitude that influenced pop culture and values, as well as hard rock and punk rock style in the late 1970s.

We intend to emphasise only the best and true values of these urban subcultures that were highly positive for the young society. We also evolve this culture in the digital world, creating a unique virtual place in the Moto-Verse.

We aim to keep up the physical world of motorcycles with the digital sphere in this unique place of Cotton Moto-Verse. This is a world of hybrids, where motorcycles, art and tech, music, and animation are linked together since we believe that to be rockers is a state of mind everywhere, and the same goes for a Cotton motorcycle.

We believe in a future built around superior experience, positive engagement, transparency, and inclusive economics to create a fairer system for all. We aim to revolutionize the motorcycle industry by bringing forth innovations to customer experience, data driven engagement, and ecosystem economics for the benefit of Cotton's community.
) } export default Aboutus;
